entry.content:

#！/usr/bin/env python

-- coding:utf-8 --

author: SueMagic time:2018/7/11

from tkinter import * #all=[a,b]
from PIL import ImageTk, Image

#主界面关闭窗口
def closeWindow():
noclose = Toplevel(window)
noclose.geometry(“300x130+666+290”)
noclose.title(“嘿嘿”)
label = Label(noclose, text=”再考虑考虑哦”, font=(‘微软雅黑’, 35))
label.pack()
btn = Button(noclose, text=”行”, width=20, height=2, command=noclose.destroy)
btn.pack()

#点击”可以”,弹窗口
def Love():

#一个独立的顶级窗口love = Toplevel(window)love.geometry ("300x180+666+290")love.title("好巧")label = Label(love,text = "好巧，我也是!!!",font = ('微软雅黑',30))#包label.pack()label1 = Label(love, text= "留个联系方式呗",font=('微软雅黑', 20))label1.pack()entry = Entry (love ,font = ('楷体',15))entry.pack()btn = Button(love,text = "爱你",width = 10, height = 2,command = bestlove)btn.pack()love.protocol("WM_DELETE_WINDOW", closeWindow)

#”可以”的关闭窗口
def closelove():
closelove = Toplevel(window)
closelove.geometry(“300x130+666+290”)
closelove.title(“嘿嘿”)
label = Label(closelove, text=”嘿嘿，想跑？”, font=(‘微软雅黑’, 35))
label.pack()
btn = Button(closelove, text=”怎么可能”, width=40, height=2, command=closelove.destroy)
btn.pack()

#点击”滚”,弹窗口
def nolove():
no_love = Toplevel(window )
no_love.geometry (“300x100+666+666”)
no_love.title(“嘿嘿”)
label = Label(no_love ,text = “你再好好想想!!!”,font = (‘微软雅黑’,25))

#包label.pack()btn = Button(no_love ,text = "好吧",width = 10, height = 2,command = no_love .destroy)btn.pack()no_love.protocol("WM_DELETE_WINDOW", closenolove)

#”滚”的关闭窗口
def closenolove():

#递归函数（回调）nolove()

#关闭所有窗口
def closeallwindow():

#销毁窗口window.destroy()

#创建窗口
window = Tk()

#设置窗口标题

window.title(“Love”)

#设置窗口大小 小写x
window.geometry(“390x520”)

#窗口位置
window.geometry(“+456+169”)

#窗口无法关闭
window.protocol(“WM_DELETE_WINDOW”,closeWindow)

#标签控件
label1 = Label(window,text = “hey, 小姐姐” ,font = (‘微软雅黑’, 15))

#定位 grid（网格式布局） pack place
label1.grid(row = 0,column = 0,sticky=W)
label2 = Label(window,text = “喜欢我吗?” ,font = (‘微软雅黑’, 45))

#sticky 对其方法 NSWE
label2.grid(row = 1,column = 1,sticky=E)

#显示图片
photo = PhotoImage(file = ‘./love.png’)
imageLable = Label(window,image = photo )

#columspan 组件所跨越的列数
imageLable.grid(row = 2,columnspan = 2 )

#按钮

#command 按钮点击触发的事件
btn1 = Button(window ,text = “可以”,width = 15,height = 2,command = Love)
btn1.grid(row = 3,column = 0, sticky=W)
btn2 = Button(window ,text = “滚”,command = nolove )
btn2.grid(row = 3,column = 1, sticky=E)

#显示窗口 消息循环
window.mainloop()
